thread.title: Firebirds Wood Fired Grill opening soon in Grapevine | Community Impact
thread.title_full: Firebirds Wood Fired Grill opening soon in Grapevine | Community Impact

author: Connor Pittman
title: Firebirds Wood Fired Grill opening soon in Grapevine | Community Impact
text: [Firebirds Wood Fired Grill](https://firebirdsrestaurants.com/)will soon begin serving its hand-cut steaks, seafood, burgers and chicken to diners in Grapevine. The restaurant will be located behind the already open [Velvet Taco](https://communityimpact.com/dallas-fort-worth/grapevine-colleyville-southlake/dining/2023/02/03/velvet-taco-brings-tacos-with-international-flavors-to-grapevine/)and nearby [Son of a Butcher](https://communityimpact.com/dallas-fort-worth/grapevine-colleyville-southlake/dining/2023/03/20/son-of-a-butcher-serving-sliders-fries-shakes-in-grapevine/). A conditional-use permit for Firebirds was approved by Grapevine City Council in [March 2023](https://communityimpact.com/dallas-fort-worth/grapevine-colleyville-southlake/business/2023/03/27/firebirds-wood-fire-grill-plans-approved-by-grapevine-city-council/). Brett Anz, principal at real estate developer TradeCor, the firm developing the site, said further development of two nearby restaurants is planned to finish in 2024. - Opening Feb. 26 - 450 W. SH 114, Grapevine [www.firebirdsrestaurants.com](https://firebirdsrestaurants.com/)
